Class Vilain

java.lang.Object
characters.Character
characters.Vilain
Direct Known Subclasses:
Ork, RabbitOfCaerbannog
public abstract class Vilain extends Character
An abstract class representing all the characters that can attack the hero
Author:
Lilian
